feedbacks.title: Add a dark theme option
feedbacks.description: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

comments.author: Jamas Skinner
comments.content: Second this! I do a lot of late night coding and reading...

feedbacks.title: Add tags for solutions
feedbacks.description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

feedbacks.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
feedbacks.description: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

comments.author: Ryan Welles
comments.content: This would be really helpful for beginners.

feedbacks.title: Allow image/video upload
feedbacks.description: Images and screenshots can enhance comments on solutions.

feedbacks.title: Ability to follow others
feedbacks.description: Stay updated on comments and solutions other people post.

feedbacks.title: Preview images not loading
feedbacks.description: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter.

feedbacks.description: Add ability to create professional looking portfolio from profile.

feedbacks.title: Bookmark challenges
feedbacks.description: Be able to bookmark challenges to take later on.
